name: Thomas Ladgrove

roles_in_work.title: The Loom never stops : a conversation with Thomas Ladgrove
The Loom never stops : a conversation with Thomas Ladgrove

biography: Thomas Ladgrove was a ward of the state when employed by Brintons carpet factory in 1967. He worked there for 41 years and worked on the loom. At age 18, he became the youngest weaver in Australia and England. He worked at Brintons until the company ceased operations in Australia in June 2008.
